# Kristjan Grm

> Builder from Slovenia, Ljubljana. Full-stack engineer building at the intersection of AI, crypto, and privacy-preserving tech. 16+ hackathon projects with multiple wins across ETHGlobal events worldwide.

## About

Kristjan is a builder who travels the world participating in hackathons. He has shipped projects in Buenos Aires, Seoul, Taipei, Paris, Bangkok, London, Brussels, Istanbul, Lisbon, Amsterdam, and more.

Interests: AI agents, crypto payments, self-sovereign identity, privacy-preserving technologies.

Personal: Cat owner, hiking, badminton, techno, cooking.

## Links

- [GitHub](https://github.com/grmkris)
- [X/Twitter](https://x.com/_krisgg)
- [LinkedIn](https://linkedin.com/in/kristjan-grm-1572a7159)

## Notable Projects

- [yoda.fun](https://yoda.fun): AI Oracle for prediction markets
- [drizzle-pg-notify-audit-table](https://github.com/grmkris/drizzle-pg-notify-audit-table): PostgreSQL real-time audit tables with Drizzle ORM
- [typeid-drizzle-zod-example](https://github.com/grmkris/typeid-drizzle-zod-example): Type-safe TypeIDs with Drizzle ORM and Zod

## Hackathon Wins

- **ETHGlobal Buenos Aires 2025** - Closet (Coinbase CDP Winner)
- **ETHGlobal New Delhi 2025** - Opensource Orchestra (ENS 1st Place)
- **ETHGlobal Prague 2025** - Mivio (Yellow 1st Place)
- **BuidlAI Seoul 2025** - AgentForge (Nethermind 1st, Rootstock 1st)
- **ETHGlobal Paris 2023** - PEERwallet (Polygon ID 1st Place)
- **ETHPrague 2023** - PeerUp (5 prizes)
- **ETHAmsterdam 2022** - Web3Hunt (The Graph 1st Place)

## Tech Stack

TypeScript, React, Next.js, Node.js, Bun, PostgreSQL, Drizzle ORM, Solidity, Hardhat, Viem, Wagmi, Vercel AI SDK, OpenAI API, Claude API.
